interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Blender Sponge Set - 4 Pack Latex Free Q-Soft Makeup Beauty Foundation Blending Sponge Flawless Smooth Brush for Liquid Foundation BB Creams Powders Concealer (4 Pack)
Review Date: 2019/02/11
Store: FRESHME
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '681413196902', 'Manufacturer': 'FRESHME'}
Review Text: I'm not a complete beauty sponge snob and I've tried lots of different brands, both high-end and budget friendly, and I found sponges I liked at both price points. These sponges are definitely on the farmer side, so for that reason they aren't my favorite. They do expand when wet and I really do like the shape of the larger ones in this set--they are very similar to the Real Techniques sponges--but they're just not as soft and bouncy as some of the others that I prefer. If you're looking for a good drugstore-priced sponge I recommend the Loreal ones.
Review Title: Kind of firm but good shapes
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Exactly as advertised.  Lasted all day with great odor and wetness protection.  I also appreciated that the scent was subtle enough not to compete with my cologne.  I'll be buying this again.
Great, all day protection with a pleasantly subtle scent

The color shift isn't quite as pronounced in person, but it's still super pretty. In good light, the pink color flashes copper. The wear time is good too. The picture is after three days of wear and it still looks excellent.
Pink shifts to copper!
BeautyBio GloPRO Regeneration Tools
{'Product Dimensions': '9.88 x 2.38 x 7.88 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZumYu', 'Batteries': '2 AAA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '810813030237 851262002673', 'Manufacturer': 'BeautyBio', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
I've been in the market for a microneedling device for a while now, but I wasn't sure if I needed something super expensive or if I could get away with a more budget-friendly option. I decided to try two super inexpensive versions , both costing around $20 and see if this significantly more expensive option from GloPRO was really worth it. In short, yes. Both of the cheaper options were incredibly painful and flimsy feeling. One of them even felt kind of like getting a face tattoo. It was awful. The GloPRO option actually feels nice on the skin because of the vibration feature and the red light therapy is a huge benefit for those monthly breakouts. I do feel like my skin care is absorbing more effectively since I've been using this, but it's still an extremely expensive tool. If you really want a microneedling device, in my opinion this is worth the investment, however, I don't think it's a necessary item.
Super pricey, but much better than the budget-friendly alternatives

They do expand when wet and I really do like the shape of the larger ones in this set--they are very similar to the Real Techniques sponges--but they're just not as soft and bouncy as some of the others that I prefer. If you're looking for a good drugstore-priced sponge I recommend the Loreal ones.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Grooming Product Preference:** Prefers solid anti-perspirants and deodorants that provide all-day odor and wetness protection, alongside a variety of makeup tools and accessories.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Enjoys subtle scents that enhance rather than overpower personal fragrances.
- **Brand Affinity:** Leans towards established, reliable brands across grooming and beauty categories, including cosmetics and skincare devices.
- **Review Behavior:** Reviews reflect a balanced perspective; while generally positive, the user is discerning and expects quality across both high-end and budget products. Satisfaction is based on performance and usability, as seen in their recent feedback on makeup sponges.
- **Diversified Interests:** Open to exploring new beauty technologies, particularly advanced skincare tools, while remaining conscious of quality and effectiveness.
- **Value for Money:** Acknowledges the quality differences between budget and premium options, often investing in higher-quality products that demonstrate clear benefits.
- **Replenishment Intent:** Shows loyalty to brands that deliver consistently high performance and is willing to repurchase effective items.

Overall, the user values effectiveness and reliability in personal grooming and beauty products, focusing on quality, moderate pricing, and a preference for trusted brands, while remaining open to diverse beauty solutions that align with their high standards. Recent interactions indicate a critical yet fair approach towards products, highlighting a desire for optimal value.
